name: Testing-Associates
overview:
Testing-Associates is a leading service provider in field of Software testing and Test Management Services.

We undertake testing project at our facility or at client location on customer’s requirement basis (ad-hoc hiring or long term hiring).

Please contact us at sheetal@testing-associates.com with your requirements to enable us serve you better.

Our Services: #. Test harness development and maintaining test execution results log #. Analysis of Software under test for defect density and risk areas #. Software test Automation (client need not to invest in hi-end tools for regression tools) #. Software Performance testing #. Threshold analysis of product #. Localization and Internationalization testing of products #. Logo compliance testing #. SOX compliance and other regulatory requirements testing #. Virtual test environment development and maintainence #. Virtual environment based automation #. Software vulnerability analysis for latest Security threats #. Online payments and Payment gateway integration testing #. Device drivers testing
